BATSLAP!

Insert the following somewhere within <body> 

        
          <div
            class    = "batslap batslap-sm"
            data-rbn = "I found this **DMCA takedown notice** in the mail and --"
            data-bmn = "**I'm Batman!**">
          </div>

Insert the following just before the closing </body> 

        
          <script type="text/javascript" src="batslap.min.js"></script>

The result

Surround your text with two *'s for **bold** text or 1 * for *Italics*.

Want a larger version? Don't use the batslap-sm class. 

        
          <div
            class    = "batslap"
            data-rbn = "I found this DMCA takedown notice in the mail and --"
            data-bmn = "I'm Batman!">
          </div>

Only one character talking... 

        
          <div
            class    = "batslap"
            data-rbn = "Batman, *I love you* --">
          </div>

Change the Boy Wonder's dialog

        
          window.Batslap.rtalk(string[, index]);

Change the Caped Crusader's dialog

        
          window.Batslap.btalk(string[, index]);
String string literal. Pass an empty string to remove balloon.
Index Integer representing an index starting at 0. Leave blank to change all instances.
Examples: 
        
          window.Batslap.rtalk('*Hey batman, what are you getting your parents for christ-*');
          window.Batslap.btalk('*My parents are **deeaaaaaaad!!!***');
        
      
        
          window.Batslap.rtalk('*This is the first instance of --*', 0);
          window.Batslap.btalk('**Shut up!**', 0);
        
      
        
          window.Batslap.btalk('', 2);
